SELECT L_NO, L_SUBJECT, L_ADDR, L_CONTENT, L_REP_IMG, L_ENABLE, L_PAYMENT, TO_CHAR(L_SDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS L_SDATE, TO_CHAR(L_EDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS L_EDATE, L_RATE FROM LENDPLACE
(L_SUBJECT like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or L_CONTENT like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%')
AND REGEXP_LIKE(L_ADDR,#{searchAddr})
AND ((L_PAYMENT >= #{min_pay} and #{max_pay} >= L_PAYMENT))
AND ((L_SDATE >= #{l_sdate} and #{l_edate} >= L_EDATE))
ORDER BY L_NO DESC

SELECT L_NO, L_SUBJECT, L_ADDR, L_CONTENT, L_REP_IMG, L_ENABLE, L_PAYMENT, TO_CHAR(L_SDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS L_SDATE, TO_CHAR(L_EDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS L_EDATE, L_RATE, L_UDATE FROM LENDPLACE WHERE L_NO = #{L_NO}
SELECT TO_CHAR(U_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS U_DATE FROM PLACEBOOK WHERE L_NO = #{L_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LENDPLACE ( L_NO, L_SUBJECT, L_ADDR, L_CONTENT, L_ENABLE, L_PAYMENT, L_SDATE, L_EDATE ) VALUES ( LENDPLACE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{L_SUBJECT}, #{L_ADDR}, #{L_CONTENT}, #{L_ENABLE}, #{L_PAYMENT}, TO_DATE(#{L_SDATE},'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{L_EDATE},'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.update: UPDATE LENDPLACE SET L_SUBJECT = #{L_SUBJECT}, L_CONTENT = #{L_CONTENT}, L_REP_IMG = #{L_REP_IMG}, L_ENABLE = #{L_ENABLE}, L_PAYMENT = #{L_PAYMENT} WHERE L_NO = #{L_NO}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLACEBOOK ( PB_NO, L_NO, M_NO, PB_DATE, U_DATE ) VALUES ( PLACEBOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{L_NO}, #{M_NO}, TO_DATE(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{U_DATE},'YYYY-MM-DD') )
mapper.update: UPDATE LENDPLACE SET L_UDATE = L_UDATE + 1 WHERE L_NO = #{L_NO}
UPDATE LENDPLACE SET L_UDATE = L_UDATE - 1 WHERE L_NO = #{L_NO}

mapper.select: SELECT M.M_ID, R.L_NO, R.R_NO, R.M_NO, R.R_CONTENT, R.R_DATE, R.R_DELETEFLAG, R.R_PARENT, R.R_DEPTH, R.R_ORDER, R.R_GROUP FROM MEMBERS M, REVIEW R WHERE M.M_NO=R.M_NO AND R.L_NO=#{L_NO} ORDER BY R.R_ORDER ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET R_ORDER = R_ORDER + 1 WHERE L_NO=#{L_NO} AND R_ORDER > (SELECT R_ORDER FROM REVIEW WHERE R_NO = #{R_PARENT})
